ИГРА ПРИКОЛДЕСНАЯ НО МЕНЯ ЛИЧНО СПУСТЯ 15 ЧАСОВ ЗАЕБЛА А ТАК ПО СКИДКЕ МОЖНО ВЗЯТЬ
needs more ways to kill people without having one run around and others do generators.

As much as the game can be frustrating, bugs, glitches, face campers, tunnellers. Despite all that, the game is a blast, addictive, especially with friends. You rage, yet you keep playing because escaping is actually pretty satisfying. The game is meant to be hard for survivors. It has a unique concept, no other games out there is close to Dead by Daylight, playing original killers and even licensed killers like Michael Myers or The Pig from Saw. Worth it, especially on sale!

It is a decent multiplayer game, something about the hide and seek of it all continues to hit that adrenaline. A successful 4V1, game that has a bunch of horror IP characters from games and movies you know. Plus a bunch of new unique characters.

The grind is real, so i can see it getting boring if you need to get everything, but if you want a meta/near meta build, the investment isn't too much. and then you'll just want more.

This game is like getting hit by your dad, you and your siblings are trying to get all the chores done and leave the house as fast as possible while your dad is sacrificing you to your mother.

fun game, very high skill ceiling with both survivors and killers. As A killer main, I feel I should tell you, at high ranks, survivors troll and provoke you all the time, and if you don't play by their communities made up rules, they'll get mad, and if you do follow them, you'll derank and never climb. Play the game how you want, but that being said, camping at high ranks will cause you too lose rank, and points overall so best not to do so. 

Tunnel all day if you want. They'll be salty, but hey, escape better and maybe they shouldn't heal right at the hook. Very fun game, but just know you won't win all the time, and if you go into each match with a neutral mind set, and semi low expectations on your efficiency, you'll have a less stressful, angry time, trust.
If you wamt to give yourself head cancer buy this game.

I can not tell you, how much I hate this game. Why do you write a positive review then, you might ask? Well, I do not know the awnser to that question. Maybe it is, that my rage and anger over the last few months of me playing this game or the toxicity of this community just simply burned away my last brain cells... But I can genuenly not. stop. playing. this. game.

So in conclusion... do I recommend it? 
No.
Should you buy it anyways?
Yes.
